title: Brill with fennel pollen wrapped in ‘spaghetti’ of potato
description: If you can get your hands on it, fennel pollen is an incredibly intense version of the flavour of fennel seed and a wonderful seasoning for fish. Here brill is wrapped in strands of potato and baked, served with heritage tomatoes and parsley sauce.Equipment and preparation: you will need a fruit and vegetable spiraliser for this recipe.
ingredients: 2 x 180g/6oz boneless brill fillets, skin off
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 large handful flatleaf parsley, leaves only
